question: On which date, the 2019 edition of National Legal Services Day (NLSD) is celebrated?
explanation: In India, the National Legal Services Day (NLSD) is celebrated every year on 9th of November to make people aware of the various provisions under the Legal Services Authorities Act (LSAA) of 1987 and the right of the litigants. The act was enacted with effect from 9th November 1987. Hence, to commemorate the occasion, the day of enactment was first celebrated in 1995 as NLSD.
